dict.string: Connect to LifeLens wearable device for health monitoring
Take profile photos for your health profile
Access contacts to set up emergency contacts
Use Face ID to securely access your health data
Read health data for comprehensive monitoring
Save health data from LifeLens monitoring

(base) basorge@MacBookPro LifeLens % # Clean derived data rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData
# Build for iOS 18.2 simulator with 18.0 deployment target xcodebuild -scheme LifeLens -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=18.2,name=iPhone 15' build zsh: command not found: # zsh: command not found: # Command line invocation: /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/xcodebuild -scheme LifeLens -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,OS=18.2,name=iPhone 15" build
